distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for go1.17 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-29526: Fixed faccessat() system call operation that checked the wrong group (bsc#1199413).

- go1.17.10 (released 2022-05-10) (bsc#1190649).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Go before 1.17.10 and 1.18.x before 1.18.2 has Incorrect Privilege Assignment. When called with a non-zero flags parameter, the Faccessat function could incorrectly report that a file is accessible.
notes.title: CVE description
